Text: shame about the audience laughing in background
much better than previous source very watchable

The laughing isnt that bad, this is very decent for a cam.
I like how they tell you what he is saying, when he is speaking cligon or whatever.

Looks Decent, not playable on PS3 though. Protected by an audio watermark called Cinavia. It is an in-audible code in the audio track. The PS3, and some Blu-ray players will check the audio source for the watermark, and recognise that it is not being played in a theatre like the watermark states it should be. Works fine on a PC though. A-6, V-7. not bad quality. thanks for the upload.
